item.description:
At our General Meetings I like to circulate among the people that meet a participant list with each person's brief bio, areas of interest and training, and links to current or past projects. This helps facilitate discussion, networking, and collaboration.

So either email me this info or add to your profile.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers August Meeting
